english.segment1: I'm not above asking. Asking for your help. I'm not above asking. I know myself. For you to find a way
english.segment2: I'm not above trying to understand. I'm not above trying to take your hand. I'm not above (I'm not above). I'm not above trying to understand. I'm not above trying to take your hand. I'm not above (I'm not above)
english.segment3: You come closer to me. Breaking through to you. And closer, hiding all
english.segment4: You know me better than i do. It's better if you lead the way
english.segment5: You know me better than i do. It's better if you lead the way
english.segment6: You know me better than i do. It's better if you lead the way
english.segment7: You know me better than i do. It's better if you lead the way
